text: Hey - i think you can use the | safe filter.
Although not sure you can use that in emails.
Nope, filters don't work on personalization tokens in email

Re: my message yesterday. Support tells me that there's some gating that allows unescaped HTML in email contact properties. Is that new? Because as I said, it seemed to work fine a few days ago, and I've tested in other portals as well.
^ Just an update, we were able to resolve this. If you experience escaping HTML please reach out to Support.
